attributes.action: Cancel Christmas 2020 to help beat COVID 19
attributes.additional_details: To bring the infection rates down. There are more chances of more  Christmas's but there is only one chance at life...
attributes.background: To be firm with the whole UK nation that we all need to buckle down and beat this virus - and to do so all families should spend Christmas in their own homes thus eliminating all travel and compromising social distancing risks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553660
